name: Blooming_Bulb_Harvest_Throw_Pillow
reviews: Love these pillows on my couch. Colors are true to picture online

These were the perfect color combination for my new living room. They are of a great quality and the colors are exactly what you see online. The brown has a bit of burgundy in it but was not a problem for me.
Great fabric and colors are true to what you see online.
